headline: Is Colgate-Palmolive (CL) Offering A Fair Entry Point After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Colgate-Palmolive at around US$85 per share is offering fair value or a stretched price, you are not alone. The stock has returned 0.8% over the last week, 6.9% over the last month, 9.7% year to date, but is still showing a 4.3% decline over the past year, which gives mixed signals about how the market currently views its prospects and risks. These moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in consumer staples companies, as investors weigh the appeal...
